extendedInfo.description: This application has the Doctor Who Soundtracks available to play instantly, in high quality! Written by Murray Gold and played by The BBC National Orchestra of Wales, Conducted by Ben Foster. INCLUDES best tracks such as Vale Decem, I Am The Doctor and The Majestic Tale (of a Madman in a Box!The app is organised by a menu in which you can scroll through and find every single Doctor Who soundtrack ever released and play tracks from those albums instantly! This is a must-have app for whovians and soundtrack music lovers!YOU MUST BE CONNECTED TO WIFI OR MOBILE DATA FOR IT TO WORK!=================Disclaimer:"Copyright Disclaimer Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976, allowance is made for "fair use" for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship, and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statute that might otherwise be infringing. Non-profit, educational or personal use tips the balance in favor of fair use."

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work and no support
reviews.comment: When I purchased this app, I thought it was cool to have all the DW music in one spot. But none of the tracks play, I only get \'error loading track\' messages.  I tried deleting and redownloading, and moving to my SD card to allow for more data, but still nothing.  No response from sending a number of emails through the contact us link.  I\'m sure this app would rate 5 stars if it worked, and I\'ll be glad to update if and when I am allowed to experience this app.  Woodssapps,  check your emails and help!!!
reviews.author: Phillip Swartz

reviews.title: Whovian
reviews.comment: Great to have all the music just would be better if it didn\'t have error message when loading would be even better not to need data usage just direct download to phone other wise luv it
reviews.author: Jeremy Yerger

reviews.comment: Won\'t play a single thing! \"Error in playing soundtrack\"
reviews.author: Siera Hansen
